feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks in a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 shows a more formal word choice and structure compared to the informal language and slang in Text 2.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has longer and more complex sentences, while Text 2 consists of shorter, more fragmented sentences.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 conveys a more professional tone related to LinkedIn, while Text 2 has a more casual and opinionated tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical choices, sentence structures, and tones, it is unlikely that the two texts were written by the same author.
